description:
The laser transmission system fired by the Space Assembly League has inflicted terrible damage on the Aerial. Suletta, rushing to the rescue in the Calibarn, must bear the full load of the data storm.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: May All Blessings Find Their Way to You, I`m Wishing It
Meippai no Shukufuku o Kimi ni
Mögest du mit allen Segen gesegnet sein
Tous mes vœux de bonheur pour tout le reste de ta vie
